title: Drawing, "Costume Design for Woman in Green, Lilac, and Silver Dress, for Christmas Tableaux, Strand Theatre"
medium: Brush and wash, silver gouache, graphite on illustration board
markings: Stamped in black ink, lower right: THIS DRAWING IS MY PERSONAL PROPERTY / AND MUST BE RETURNED TO ME / HENRY DREYFUSS
creditline: Gift of University of California, Los Angeles
description: Female figure in purple, green, and silver dress, wearing a hat.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Costume Design for Woman in Green, Lilac, and Silver Dress, for Christmas Tableaux, Strand Theatre".
Brush and wash, silver gouache, graphite on illustration board. Gift of University of California, Los Angeles. 1973-15-130.
